title: inappropriate/Offensive Summoner Name?
body: Is the summoner name "Busty Wenches" considered inappropriate/offensive and therefore ban worthy? I just really like the name and would not like to  change my name and then get banned.  :(

replies.body: I'd say it's questionable, but it's up to the community for that one based on getting reported.  My general rule of thumb is that if you think the name might be offensive then it probably wouldn't be a good idea.
